name: 30 Seconds Help
description:
[Created for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022]

It's my first game jam ! Made it in 5 days alone.

Play as a soul that trapped in a place where there are other souls trapped. Help them so they get to the heaven by shooting at them with holy pistol.

Controls :

- WASD : Move

- Left Click : Shoot

Goal :

- Help as many souls as you can by shooting at them in 30 seconds.
